auth.Email exists: An account with this email address already exists. Please log in to submit a new application or continue an existing one.
auth.Receive email: You have received an email from us which you can use to complete the registration. Look now in your mailbox and carefully read the email.
auth.We have: We sent this email to the following address:
auth.Not received: If you have not received the email, or the email address is not correct, you can correct in the field and have the email sent again.
auth.The email was: The email for the validation was sent to
auth.Should Receive: You should receive the email one minute at most.
auth.Enter auth code: For added security, please enter the authentication code from your 2FA app.
